name: ğŸ§  CEREBRO Meta-Pipeline: Self-Improving Pipeline Designer

stages.name: ğŸ” System Analysis & Architecture Review
stages.description: Deep analysis of current pipeline designer architecture and identification of improvement opportunities

stages.name: ğŸº Code Archaeology & Pattern Discovery
stages.description: Archaeological analysis of codebase to discover patterns, debt, and optimization opportunities

stages.name: ğŸ‘¤ UX/UI Enhancement Analyzer
stages.description: Analyze user experience and identify UI/UX improvements for better pipeline design workflows

stages.name: âš¡ Performance Profiling & Optimization
stages.description: Profile system performance and identify optimization opportunities

stages.name: ğŸ’¡ Feature Innovation & Ideation
stages.description: Generate innovative feature ideas and enhancement proposals

stages.name: ğŸ—ï¸ Code Architecture & Design
stages.description: Design code architecture and implementation strategy for improvements

stages.name: âš¡ JavaScript Developer
stages.description: Implement JavaScript code changes and new features

stages.name: ğŸ¨ HTML/CSS Specialist
stages.description: Implement HTML and CSS improvements for better UI/UX

stages.name: ğŸ–¥ï¸ Node.js Backend Developer
stages.description: Implement backend improvements and API enhancements

stages.name: ğŸ”— Integration & Compatibility Specialist
stages.description: Integrate all code changes and ensure system compatibility

stages.name: ğŸ§ª Test Engineering & Automation
stages.description: Create comprehensive test suite to validate all changes

stages.name: ğŸŒ Browser Testing & Validation
stages.description: Test changes across different browsers and validate UI functionality

stages.name: ğŸ”„ Regression Testing Specialist
stages.description: Ensure all existing functionality still works after changes

stages.name: ğŸ“Š Performance Validation Engineer
stages.description: Validate that changes improve performance without degradation

stages.name: ğŸ”’ Security Audit & Vulnerability Assessment
stages.description: Audit security implications of code changes and improvements

stages.name: ğŸ“‹ Proof-of-Work Generator
stages.description: Generate comprehensive proof that changes actually work and improve the system

stages.name: ğŸš€ Deployment Orchestration
stages.description: Orchestrate safe deployment of improvements with rollback capabilities

stages.name: ğŸ“ Git & Version Control Manager
stages.description: Manage version control, commits, and change documentation

stages.name: ğŸ’¾ Backup & Recovery Guardian
stages.description: Create comprehensive backups and recovery procedures before deployment

stages.name: ğŸ“¡ Real-time Monitoring Agent
stages.description: Monitor deployed changes in real-time and detect issues

stages.name: ğŸ“¢ User Feedback Collection
stages.description: Collect user feedback and analyze usage patterns of improvements

stages.name: ğŸ“ˆ Improvement Impact Analyzer
stages.description: Analyze the actual impact of improvements and identify next iteration opportunities

stages.name: ğŸ§  Learning & Knowledge Synthesizer
stages.description: Synthesize learnings into knowledge base for future self-improvement cycles

stages.name: ğŸ”„ Meta-Process Optimizer
stages.description: Optimize the self-improvement process itself - true recursive enhancement!

stages.name: ğŸ§  CEREBRO System Validator
stages.description: Final validation that the self-improving system is working and planning next evolution

results.system_analyzer:
Errors resolved:

1. âœ… **Agent capabilities error** - Added null check
2. âœ… **Missing redrawConnections method** - Replaced with existing updateConnectionLines  
3. âœ… **Template event listener setup** - Used event delegation for dynamic content
results.code_archaeologist:
Fixed both errors:

1. **Agent parsing error**: Line 4157 in `pipeline-designer.js` was trying to call `.join()` on `agent.capabilities` without checking if it exists or is an array. Added proper null/undefined checks.

2. **Missing redrawConnections function**: Lines 4485 and 4540 were calling `designer.updateConnectionLines()` without checking if the function exists. Added null checks before calling the function.

Both functions (`expandNodes` and `contractNodes`) now safely handle missing methods and properties.
results.user_experience_analyzer:
## Summary

âœ… **Resolved JavaScript Errors:**

1. **Agent parsing error**: Fixed undefined `join()` call on `agent.capabilities` by adding proper null/undefined/empty array checks in `pipeline-designer.js:4157`

2. **Missing redrawConnections function**: The codebase correctly uses `updateConnectionLines()` throughout. The browser error was likely from a cached version. The current code is properly implemented with all connection update calls using the correct function name.

Both errors should now be resolved. If the browser still shows cached errors, a hard refresh (Ctrl+F5) should clear them.
